price: 33. (Muuse) wuxuu yidhi: Rabbiyow! Waxaan dilay nin ka mid ah, waxaan ka cabsan inay i dilaan.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي قَتَلۡتُ مِنۡهُمۡ نَفۡسٗا فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī qataltu min'hum nafsan fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
